Tecmo Asks For Input on MR4!!!!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2002 Topics ( Year Of The Password): Tecmo Asks For Input on MR4!!!!
By Lisa Shock on Monday, January 21, 2002 - 01:57 pm:

Go to Tecmo's MR3 Forum and post any suggestions you may have. You have until Friday, and ideas used will get a person credit in the game, plus a free copy!

This is it! Go now, no whining later!

By Lisa Shock on Friday, January 25, 2002 - 03:06 pm:

Thanks everyone! Some great ideas for Tecmo to consider!

By torey luvullo on Tuesday, February 19, 2002 - 05:18 am:

done. the comments formerly seen in this thread are now on disc. as lisa pointed out, they came too late and in the wrong place for tecmo's development team to see them, but they are available for the next opportunity for public input.

thanks to everyone for the great suggestions!

like i said before, [before i deleted my own comment], feel free to hypothesize, conjecture, fantasize, or analyze the possibilities and promise of mr4. however, no special efforts will be taken to preserve any such brilliance, and if tecmo announces a new window of public comment, you are on your own to get it to them at the time and place they want it.

By B Campbell on Tuesday, February 19, 2002 - 11:58 am:

By Velo on Tuesday, February 19, 2002 - 04:31 pm:

It sure is taking Japan quite a while, I should hope that they use some of the ideas and not have it be a wasted effort.

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, February 19, 2002 - 04:58 pm:

The official submission date is past. They occasionally ask my opinion on particular things, so it's good for me to have input, but they are not still asking for ideas. Once Eggo locked that thread at Tecmo, it was over.

And, Velo, it may take months before anything is finalized about the contest. It's just too early in the development cycle.
